Call and text candidates directly from your browser with one click.


CallMantra's chrome extension detects phone numbers on any website and allows you to call and text the number with just one click. 

Make calls and send text messages to candidates directly from job boards such as Dice, Monster, Indeed, Career Builder, and ZipRecruiter via our chrome extension. 

CallMantra integrates with leading ATSs including Bullhorn, JobDiva, Zoho Recruit, etc., where you can call, text, add numbers to power dialer campaigns, and send personalized SMS templatesâ€“every interaction is automatically recorded within your ATS.
